internal.subject: <<Your Performance||An Observation||Just Saying>>
internal.body: I am <<really||very||quite||somewhat||especially>> <<happy with||disappointed with||sad about||confused about||content with|| ambivalent about>> your <<performance on||contribution to||opinion of>> the <<Henderson||Michaelson||Strongfellow||Samuelson||Flaherty>> <<account||report||sale||analysis>>.

external.subject: <<Hey You||My Dude||Long time||Reaching out>>
external.body: <<Hey||Wassup||Hi>>, it's Pam, from <<Freemont High||Banneker SHS||Coconut Grove Elementary||West Lab||Fort Lincoln>>. You probably don't remember me, but we are planning our reunion for next summer and wanted to see if you would be attending?

external.subject: <<Your Performance||An Observation||Just Saying>>
external.body: I am <<really||very||quite||somewhat||especially>> <<happy with||disappointed with||sad about||confused about||content with|| ambivalent about>> your <<performance on||contribution to||opinion of>> the <<Henderson||Michaelson||Strongfellow||Samuelson||Flaherty>> <<account||report||sale||analysis>>.

malware.subject: Password Check Required Immediately
malware.body: Your account has been flagged, please verify your email with the link below

malware.subject: A Delivery Attempt was made
malware.body: A <<DHL||UPS||FedEx||USPS||Global Freight>> delivery was not able to reach you. Please click the link below to reschedule delivery.

malware.subject: <<Microsoft||Apple||iTunes||Google>> account recovery message
malware.body: In order to reset the password on your <<Microsoft||Apple||iTunes||Google>> account, you need to click the following link.

malware.subject: A new deal in the <<Microsoft||Apple||Amazon>> store
malware.body: You have been selected to save 75% on your next <<Microsoft||Apple||Amazon>> purchase. Click below to claim your coupon.

malware.subject: New login from suspicious location
malware.body: There was a login to your <<Yahoo||Gmail||Hotmail||Outlook||Comcast||AOL>> account from a suspicious location. See below for details.

malware.subject: XBOX or PS4
malware.body: Clearly the choice of the discerning gamer is the <<XBOX||PS4>>. To join the exclusive <<XBOX||PS4>> discount club, complete the following registration.
